docs.title: SimpleCalculator
docs.text:
• fun add(a: Int, b: Int): Int — Returns the sum of two integers.
  • fun multiply(a: Int, b: Int): Int — Returns the product of two integers.

docs.title: SimpleCalculator
docs.text: A simple utility class for basic arithmetic operations.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
val calc = SimpleCalculator()
val sum = calc.add(1, 2)
val product = calc.multiply(3, 4)
